# Release HOWTO

since I forget.


1. Review existing tags and pick new release number

    ```bash
    git tag
    ```

2. Tag locally 

    ```bash
    git tag -a v0.1.0 -m "First release"
    ```

3. Push

    ```bash
    git push origin v0.1.0
    ```

4. Verify release and edit notes.   See https://github.com/client9/misspell/releases
